longdesc.p: Displays an array of items tiled horizontally and vertically. The user can pan the list horizontally or vertically.

option.name: direction
option.desc: The axis along which the panning will take place.

option.name: rotation
option.desc: If set to true, the items will be repeated when one end of the list is reached, as if they were placed on a cylinder.

event.name: create
event.desc: Triggered when a virtualgrid widget is created.

method.name: scrollTo
method.desc: Scroll to a certain set of coordinates.

signature.desc: Scrolls to the pair of coordinates specified by the parameters.

argument.name: x
argument.desc: The x-coordinate to which to scroll.

argument.name: y
argument.desc: The y-coordinate to which to scroll.

example.desc: A basic example of a page with a virtualgrid
example.html: Web UI Framework Example
